faqs.question: What is Prushal Technology Pvt. Ltd.?
responses: Prushal Technology Pvt. Ltd. is a Pune-based IT and software services company offering ERP software, web and mobile app development, cloud solutions, and digital marketing.
We are a technology-driven company providing innovative IT solutions and business automation services.
Prushal Technology specializes in digital transformation, helping businesses optimize their operations through technology.

faqs.question: Does Prushal Technology offer internships?
responses: Yes, Prushal Technology provides internships and corporate training programs in IT and software development.
We offer internship programs aimed at developing young professionals in the fields of IT, software engineering, and digital solutions.
Prushal Technology regularly offers internships and practical training programs for aspiring tech enthusiasts in various IT domains.

faqs.question: Farewell message
responses: Ok bye! Have a good day!
Goodbye, take care and have a wonderful day ahead!
Wishing you all the best! Farewell and have a great day!

faqs.question: Greeting message
responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Greetings! How may I help you?
